name: No SuperHERO Game
description:
What would you do if you woke up with superpowers? 

Many would use those powers for the good of mankind, but not Larry from accounting...

Join him on the Villain side as you go on a rampage, leap across the city, smashes cars to bits, and throws people around with his super strength!

How to Play KeyboardXbox ControllerActionLeft Analog StickWASD KeysMove aroundASpacebarJump
[Held] Charged Jump
[Held in Mid Air] Dive BombX Left Mouse ClickPunch
[Held] Dash Attack
BRight Mouse ClickGrab
Throw
[Held] Charged ThrowStartEscapePause/Unpause
